medium: Etching, on laid old book paper
title: The Steps, British Museum
marks: Written by Pennell in pencil at lower left margin: In pencil in lower margin:  Jo Pennell Imp
description:
Print has considerable texture which appears to have been imparted by roulette or soft ground etching over fabric.
Showing crossed fasces and foliage beneath a sun with rays.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. George P. Douglas, 1946
